pros: Has many summons that fight alongside you
Mobile class with ability to fly and teleport
Useful Link Skill that provides a %Damage buff for constantly moving
cons: Lots of micromanaging to maximize damage
Constantly will have to reposition your crystal which is a main source of damage
May be a bit spammy with pressing and as your main combo

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Aegis of Light, and buffs with cooldowns
Damage: +20% + (up to 12% from Link Skill) + (20% from Umbral Brand debuff)

linkSkill.desc: As you move around you gain a stacking %Damage buff

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Javelin - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush
  • Longinus Spear - Cooldown Cutter
  • Deus - Extra Strike

primary.desc: When cast, receive 1 of 4 possible buffs
details: [Ferret]: Reduces any active cooldowns by a short amount
[Salvo]: Increases your %Damage
[Mar]: Increases %EXP gained
[Ferret]: Applies all the buffs at the same time at half strength
Unlocked from completing Ark Storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.desc: After using enough Specter skills, you will be forced into Specter Mode
details: While in Specter Mode, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance and flat Attack
In 2nd Job, you gain a skill from the Ark Storyline that allows you to freely transform
When your Specter gauge fully depletes, you will not be able to regenerate it for a few seconds

primary.desc: Swipes forward with your specter arm
Swipes forward with your specter arm
details: Shares the same skill points and key slot as Ominous Nightmare
Restores some HP if attack hits

primary.desc: Swipes forward and charges a Spell Bullet
details: [Spell Bullet]: Fires a homing bullet
[Spell Bullet Buff]: Provides Movement Speed and %Knockback Resistance buff

primary.desc: Fires all Spell Bullets created from 'Charge Drive' skills
details: If bullets hit, depending on the 'Charge Drive' skill, you'll get a special buff
Bullets are the small diamonds on your Specter gauge
[Recommended]: If you right-click in Skills Tab UI, will toggle Auto Use

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump
Can be used twice in a row
Shares the same skill points and key slot as Mystic Leap
Holding the Down key while in the air allows you to fly slowly

primary.desc: Allows you freely to change into Specter Mode
details: The Specter gauge is slowly consumed while you are in Specter mode. The gauge will slowly regenerate in Lef mode
[Tip]: If you leave Specter Mode before you forcefully exit, regeneration cooldown will not occur
To gain this skill you need to complete Ark's Storyline!

primary.desc: Dash forward leaving behind a trail of fire and charges a Spell Bullet
details: [Spell Bullet]: Fires a bullet that damages enemies in an area
[Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases %Crit Rate and grants flat Attack

primary.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies you pass through
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as Scarlet Charge Drive

primary.desc: Dashes diagonally damaging enemies you pass through
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will cause you to dash downwards
Can be used twice in a row
If linked, the skill will deal damage horizontally instead

primary.desc: Dashes diagonally damaging enemies you pass through
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will cause you to dash downwards
Can be used twice in a row
If linked, the skill will deal damage horizontally instead
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as Unstoppable Impulse

primary.desc: While active, attacks will create homing orbs in Specter Mode
details: Always remember to have this toggled on!

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as Vivid Nightmare

primary.desc: Dives down towards the ground and charges a Spell Bullet
details: Can only be used in the air or on the ground by linking with
[Spell Bullet]: Fires a bullet that pulls in nearby enemies
[Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and %Avoidability

primary.desc: Leaps forward dealing damage to enemies in front of you
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as Gust Charge Drive

primary.desc: Burrow into the ground and emerge as a gigantic Specter
detail: While held, you will remain invincible and burrowed
When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.desc: Attacks have a chance to create blades that flies towards you while damaging enemies when skill is used
details: If you right-click in Skills Tab UI, the skill will toggle Auto Use mode

primary.desc: A giant specter hand slams into the ground damaging nearby enemies and charges a Spell Bullet
details: [Spell Bullet]: Fires a bullet that leaves a lingering damaging field
[Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, and %Ignore DEF

primary.desc: Violently dashes forward dealing damage to enemies
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as Abyssal Charge Drive

primary.desc: Dashes towards a nearby enemy and binds them
details: Attack will prioritize the enemy with the highest Max HP
The binded enemy takes damage at the end from all the attacks inflicted during the bind
Unaffected by Damage Reflect, cooldown resets, and does not trigger
When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
Whenever you link an attack with or , you gain stacks that make it easier to link further skills
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Final Damage
Increases pre-5th job attack's %Damage (except for , , and )
Increases pre-5th job attack's %Ignore DEF (except for , , and )
Increases pre-5th job attack's %Boss Damage (except for , , and )
Increases the number of times can be used
Increases the rate at which your Specter gauge regenerates
You will be completely immune to knockbacks in Specter Form
Using during an attack will cancel that attack and shift you into Specter Form
Can trigger when used during

hyperActive.desc: Bullet Spell buffs will be applied to your party and will have doubled effects for yourself
While held, launches a barrage of spears in front of you before dealing a final attack
details: When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form

fifthMain.name: Abyssal Recall
fifthMain.shortDesc:
You link with the Abyssal Source the moment the skill is activated. You don't consume Spectra for 30 sec while in Specter State.
While the Abyssal is active, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 6, Invincible while attacking
When attack ends, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 2400%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Explosions: 6
Cooldown: 200 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a devastating attack to enemies on the map before dealing an explosive final attack
details: After the attack, Ark will not consume any Specter resource for a short period
Female Arks do not have a cutscene animation, just the attack animation
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
Does not trigger
You are invincible while the attack is active
When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form

fifthMain.name: Infinity Spell
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 15% of Max HP
Duration: 90 sec
Flora State: When spell is charged, Basic Cast is charged as much as the remaining max spell charge limit.
Specter State: When Impending Death activates, an additional 3 Abyssal Auras are created
Cooldown: 240 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, automatically grants max charges of Basic Spell Bullet when attacking and creates more orbs

fifthMain.name: Devious Nightmare
fifthMain.shortDesc: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Nightmare is used. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 9.\nCooldown: 10 sec\nWhen Charge Drive skills (with the exception of Basic Charge Drive) land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by 1 sec, an effect that is applied only once per skill.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using Endless Nightmare, a giant Specter claw lashes out
details: Whenever you land a successful Charge Drive skill (except Basic Charge Drive and only once per skill), the cooldown is reduced

fifthMain.name: Devious Dream
fifthMain.shortDesc: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Dream is used. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 9\nCooldown: 10 sec\nWhen Grievous Wound/Tenacious Instinct/Insatiable Hunger/Boundless Horror/Unbridled Chaos land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by 1 sec, an effect that is applied only once per skill.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using Endless Dream, a giant Specter claw lashes out
details: Whenever you land a successful Specter Form attack (only once per skill), the cooldown is reduced

fifthMain.name: Endlessly Starving Beast
fifthMain.shortDesc: HP Cost: 500. Initiates a countdown to the Beast's rampage, each strike in which hits up to 12 enemies, for 2100% damage, 5 time(s). The Beast strikes 18 time(s) in all.\nIf an attack skill that utilizes Specter's Force hit successfully, the Beast's rampage will begin 0.6 sec sooner. Only 30% applied for consecutive-type skills, or for certain other skills.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant specter slowly burrows in the ground before launching up for a giant attack
details: When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Using a Specter attack will increase the speed at which the specter launches from the ground
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Illium is primary stat is INT and uses a new weapon called Magic Gauntlet and secondary weapons Lucent Wings. Illium revolves around the controlling a magical orb. You can move the orb around and attack with that orb which requires charging the orb and interacting with it
